sentences.en: "Cor, wot brilliant prizes!"
sentences.cn: “老天爷，多棒的奖品啊！”

sentences.en: a brilliant performance
sentences.cn: 精湛的演出

sentences.en: A brilliant shaft of sunlight burst through the doorway.
sentences.cn: 一束耀眼的阳光从门口照射进来。

sentences.en: a brilliant young musician
sentences.cn: 一位才华横溢的年轻音乐家

sentences.en: Eric Cantona made the game safe with a brilliant opportunist goal.
sentences.cn: 埃里克·坎通纳抓住机会踢进绝妙的一球，锁定了比赛的胜局。

sentences.en: He had a long and brilliant career .
sentences.cn: 他的事业长久而辉煌。

sentences.en: He had a nose for trouble and a brilliant tactical mind.
sentences.cn: 他善于发现问题，还总能想出高明的策略。

sentences.en: He is a terrific athlete and a brilliant jumper.
sentences.cn: 他是个出色的运动员，弹跳力非常好。

sentences.en: He was a brilliant musician.
sentences.cn: 他是一位才华横溢的音乐家。

sentences.en: He was also a brilliant propagandist for free trade.
sentences.cn: 他也是自由贸易杰出的倡导宣传者。

sentences.en: He was the most brilliant adman that any of us knew.
sentences.cn: 他是我们认识的最有才华的广告人。

sentences.en: I think that’s a brilliant idea .
sentences.cn: 我觉得那是个绝妙的主意。

sentences.en: In the end, his brilliant legal footwork paid off.
sentences.cn: 最后，他高明的法律手腕使他如愿以偿。

sentences.en: Jackie was running around with all these brilliant people.
sentences.cn: 杰姬混迹于这些才华横溢的人之间。

sentences.en: My sister's given me this brilliant book.
sentences.cn: 我的姐姐给了我这本非常好看的书。

sentences.en: Patrick Devlin was an outstanding judge and brilliant jurist.
sentences.cn: 帕特里克·德夫林是一位杰出的法官和出色的法律专家。

sentences.en: She closed her eyes against the brilliant light .
sentences.cn: 强烈的光线下，她闭起了眼睛。

sentences.en: She closed her eyes against the brilliant light.
sentences.cn: 强烈的光线下，她闭起了眼睛。

sentences.en: She had a brilliant mind.
sentences.cn: 她有极聪明的头脑。

sentences.en: She was caustically brilliant, yet totally loyal, unpretentious, human and tolerant.
sentences.cn: 她这个人才气逼人，可是绝对忠诚可靠，而且毫不做作，有人情味和宽容心。

sentences.en: She was dressed in brilliant white.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一身耀眼的白色。

sentences.en: The film was absolutely brilliant .
sentences.cn: 这部电影极为出色

sentences.en: The film was absolutely brilliant.
sentences.cn: 这部电影极为出色。

sentences.en: The goalkeeper came into his own with a series of brilliant saves.
sentences.cn: 守门员开始进入状态，作出了一连串精彩的扑救。

sentences.en: The project was a brilliant success .
sentences.cn: 这个项目非常成功。

sentences.en: We put it on and everybody said "Oh it's a brilliant production".
sentences.cn: 我们把它搬上舞台，大家都说：“噢，真是一部了不起的作品。”

sentences.en: We sat outside in the brilliant sunshine .
sentences.cn: 我们坐在外面，沐浴在灿烂的阳光下。

sentences.en: We sat outside in the brilliant sunshine.
sentences.cn: 我们坐在外面，沐浴在灿烂的阳光下。

words.tran_cn: 才华横溢的;英明的;出色的

trans.tran_cn: 巧妙的，使人印象深的，聪颖的，技艺高超的，非常好的，成功的，鲜明的，明亮的，灿烂的
trans.tran_en: brilliant light or colour is very bright and strong
